problem.markdown:
>>Changing the material type (and keeping all other parameters constants) causes:<< ( ) The shear forces to change ( ) The bending moments to change ( ) Both the shear forces and bending moments to change (x) No change in the shear forces and bending moments
[explanation] Changing the material type for a statically determinate beam results in no change in the shear forces and moments. It would, however, result in changes in the stresses. [explanation]
problem.p: Changing the material type (and keeping all other parameters constants) causes:

choicegroup.label: Changing the material type (and keeping all other parameters constants) causes:
choicegroup.choice: Both the shear forces and bending moments to change
No change in the shear forces and bending moments

div.p: Changing the material type for a statically determinate beam results in no change in the shear forces and moments. It would, however, result in changes in the stresses.
